title: The After Show Combines Music and Cigars
itunes:title: The After Show Combines Music and Cigars
description:
Mr. Jonathan is not here today. We talk about what music to listen to while smoking cigars. Also, we are celebrating the 2nd Anniversary of Studio 21 Podcast Café. The After show is brought to you by Roma Craft Tobac.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
